modName: Technicolor Alchemy Overhaul - Unique Alchemy Plants for Skyrim
summary: This mod adds over 3,500 hand placed alchemy plants to Skyrim, in over 80 unique varieties. Updated 8/16/18 added over a dozen new types of mushrooms including interiors
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6]TECHNICOLOR ALCHEMY OVERHAUL[/size]

[size=4]by mobiusbelmont[/size][size=3][/size]

[youtube]sCtnVsBKa74[/youtube][/center]
[size=4]Thanks to Dar'ShonDo for this outstanding video
[/size]
[size=6]
General Information[/size][size=5]:
[/size][size=4]I've placed over 3000 rare and colorful alchemy plant variants in locations all across Skyrim.  There are now over 80 different plants featuring some from Morrowind.  Many of these herbs have properties that differ from the common strains and the plants from Morrowind are extremely potent.[/size]






[size=6]Installation[/size]: Install only ONE MAIN FILE.  Choose either loose files or bsa archive version.   
﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿- CACO users: install the patch in the optional download section AFTER installing the main file of your choice






[size=6]Compatibility[/size][size=5]: 

[/size][size=4]- [/size][u][size=5][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69306/]Complete Alchemy and Cooking Overhaul[/url][/size][/u][size=4] is now compatible with the latest version of this mod, v3.5!  Install one of the main files first, then overwrite with the CACO patch in the optional download section.   Support only for CACO 1.2, the beta version of CACO (2.0) is untested[/size]


 - [size=5][u]Realistic Water Two[/u] [/size][size=4] must be loaded AFTER this mod.  LOOT will not give you the right load order!!! There is no need for a patch for TAO and water mods if you adjust the load order.  These dirty edits happen whenever an object is placed near water in CK.  Purity users should follow the load order from LOOT (TAO should be loaded BEFORE Purity according to user feedback)
[/size]


[size=4]- [/size][u][size=5]DynDOLOD[/size][/u][size=4]:  DEACTIVATE this mod before running DynDOLOD


[/size]





[size=5]Credits / Resources Used: [/size]
[size=4] - The colorful Skyrim plants in the mod were created with mentha's modders resource called [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25701/?]more colorful alchemy plants[/url].  [/size]
[size=5][size=3][size=2][size=5][size=3]- The Golden Kanet, Stoneflower, Marshmerrow, Willowflower, Saltrice, and Mucksponge were created using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59632/?]Phitt's Sheogorad Resource[/url].
- Wolfsbane, Violet Coprinus, Luminus Russula, Red Lichen, Black Lichen, Bungler's Bane, Hyper Facia, Fire Petal, and Belladonna were created by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/134661/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Ionis [/url]and featured in the OUTSTANDING mod Solstheim [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36017/?]The Lost Levels by Thingy Person[/url]
[/size][/size][/size]- Version 3 combines this mod with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49996/?]Special Flora of Tamriel by Link815[/url].
[/size][size=3]- MANY THANKS to Sthaagg for the CACO and Wiseman's flora patch *(version 2).  

[/size]
[/size]
author: mobiusbelmont
